messages.content: My internet is not working. What should I do?
I'm sorry to hear that. Let's start by restarting your modem and router. If the issue persists, please check for any local outages on our website.
How can I check my data usage?
You can check your data usage by logging into your account on our website or using our mobile app.
I'm experiencing slow internet speeds.
I'm sorry about that. Please try restarting your modem and router. If the problem continues, run a speed test on our website and contact us with the results.
How do I reset my router password?
You can reset your router password by logging into the router's admin page. The default login details are usually printed on a sticker on your router.
How do I upgrade my internet plan?
You can upgrade your internet plan by logging into your account on our website or by contacting our customer service.
Can I schedule a technician visit?
Yes, you can schedule a technician visit through our website or by calling our customer service.
Is there an outage in my area?
You can check for outages in your area by visiting the outage map on our website.
How do I set up my new router?
To set up your new router, plug it in, connect it to your modem, and follow the setup instructions provided in the user manual or on our website.
How can I improve my Wi-Fi signal?
You can improve your Wi-Fi signal by placing your router in a central location, away from obstructions, and minimizing interference from other electronic devices.
What should I do if my modem keeps disconnecting?

If your modem keeps disconnecting, try checking the cables, restarting the modem, and ensuring it's placed in a well-ventilated area. If the problem persists, contact our support for further assistance.
How do I change my Wi-Fi network name?
You can change your Wi-Fi network name by logging into your router's admin page and navigating to the wireless settings section.
Can I use my own modem with your service?
Yes, you can use your own modem with our service as long as it is compatible. Please refer to our website for a list of supported modems.
How do I port forward on my router?
To port forward, log into your router's admin page, navigate to the port forwarding section, and enter the necessary details for the port you wish to forward.
What is the customer service number?
You can reach our customer service at 1-800-123-4567.
How can I check my billing statement?
You can check your billing statement by logging into your account on our website and navigating to the billing section.
Can I get a discount on my plan?
We occasionally offer promotions and discounts. Please check our website or contact customer service for current offers.
How do I set up parental controls on my router?
You can set up parental controls by logging into your router's admin page and navigating to the parental controls section.
What is my IP address?
You can find your IP address by visiting our website's IP lookup tool or by checking your network settings on your device.
How do I change my DNS settings?
You can change your DNS settings by logging into your router's admin page and navigating to the DNS settings section.
How do I cancel my service?
We're sorry to see you go. You can cancel your service by contacting our customer service department at 1-800-123-4567.
How do I troubleshoot connection issues?

To troubleshoot connection issues, try restarting your modem and router, checking for loose cables, and ensuring your devices are within range of the Wi-Fi signal. If the problem persists, contact our support team for further assistance.
What are your customer service hours?
Our customer service is available 24/7 to assist you with any issues or questions you may have.
Can I move my service to a new address?
Yes, you can move your service to a new address. Please contact our customer service team to schedule the transfer and ensure service availability at your new location.
What should I do if I forgot my Wi-Fi password?
If you forgot your Wi-Fi password, you can log into your router's admin page to view or reset it. If you need further assistance, please contact our support team.
How can I test my internet speed?
You can test your internet speed by visiting our website and using our speed test tool.
Why is my internet speed slower than advertised?

Internet speeds can be affected by various factors including network congestion, device limitations, and signal interference. Please run a speed test and contact our support team with the results for further assistance.
How do I change my billing information?
You can change your billing information by logging into your account on our website and navigating to the billing section.
How do I check for firmware updates on my router?
You can check for firmware updates by logging into your router's admin page and navigating to the firmware update section. Follow the instructions to download and install the latest firmware.
How do I set up a guest Wi-Fi network?
To set up a guest Wi-Fi network, log into your router's admin page and navigate to the guest network settings. Enable the guest network and configure the settings as desired.
How do I contact technical support?
You can contact our technical support team by calling 1-800-123-4567 or by using the live chat feature on our website.
How do I change my service plan?
You can change your service plan by logging into your account on our website and selecting the plan that best suits your needs. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service for assistance.
What should I do if my internet keeps dropping?

If your internet keeps dropping, try restarting your modem and router, checking for loose cables, and ensuring your devices are within range of the Wi-Fi signal. If the problem persists, contact our support team for further assistance.
How do I check my router's signal strength?
You can check your router's signal strength by logging into your router's admin page and navigating to the status or wireless settings section.
What is a good internet speed for streaming?
For streaming HD content, a speed of at least 5 Mbps is recommended. For 4K streaming, a speed of at least 25 Mbps is ideal.
How do I set up a static IP address?
To set up a static IP address, log into your router's admin page and navigate to the network settings. Enter the desired static IP address and save the changes.
How can I boost my Wi-Fi signal?
To boost your Wi-Fi signal, place your router in a central location, away from obstructions, and minimize interference from other electronic devices. You can also consider using a Wi-Fi extender.
How do I set up port forwarding?
To set up port forwarding, log into your router's admin page, navigate to the port forwarding section, and enter the necessary details for the port you wish to forward.
What should I do if my internet is slow?

If your internet is slow, try restarting your modem and router, running a speed test, and ensuring your devices are within range of the Wi-Fi signal. If the problem persists, contact our support team for further assistance.
How do I secure my Wi-Fi network?
You can secure your Wi-Fi network by using a strong password, enabling WPA3 encryption, and regularly updating your router's firmware.
How do I change my Wi-Fi channel?
You can change your Wi-Fi channel by logging into your router's admin page and navigating to the wireless settings. Choose a channel with the least interference.
